Name: CMMG Mk12 Mutant 12 Gauge Shotgun
Description: Modified CMMG Mk47 Mutant, American-made carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm, manufactured by CMMG Inc. Works with all types of Saiga 12 magazines, including steel, polymer and drums. The shotgun has shown exceptional reliability, which, together with the classic ergonomics of the AR system, gives an excellent example of a firearm. This variant features a fully automatic firing mode, for Law Enforcement and Millitary use only. Modified to fire 12 gauge.
